    Doing Presentation...     [back]

    Here is a detailed, good and very basic instruction of this. Though it seems not difficult, few person could do it with a good manner.

    General summury is always the first thing, which may consist of only two or three sentences, making clear what's this paper doing and the core problem it is going to solve!! Than, goes into a little bit detailed things like how many steps they build and each's step's input and output as well as the relationship between these steps.

    When thing's going here, it's still remain on general level and make sure that you are really clear with these things. (Sometimes we just thought we are clear but actually not.)

    The final step would be going to details such as equation, mathematics and so on.

    Attention: Don't directly go to the details when people are not aware of what's this paper is going to do. Equation and mathematics are important but only the last thing!
